author: Discovery
description:
Parker’s only three weeks into his season and has banked more than $2 million in gold. Hoping his good luck will continue, he takes a gamble on gold in Sulphur Creek, and his crew navigates equipment through rough, narrow roads to build a wash plant. Meanwhile, Jacob repairs a wash plant after discovering a major mechanical issue.

#GoldRush new Fridays at 8P on Discovery.

#Discovery #GoldRush

Stream Full Episodes of Gold Rush
https://www.discoveryplus.com/show/gold-rush?season=15

About Gold Rush
Motivated by a depressed economy, hard-working gold miners get to work both in America and across the globe in an attempt to strike it rich.
